abstract.t: This document proposes a mechanism for BGP that would help minimizethe negative effects on routing caused by BGP restart. An End-of-RIBmarker is specified and can be used to convey routing convergenceinformation. A new BGP capability, termed 'Graceful RestartCapability', is defined which would allow a BGP speaker to expressits ability to preserve forwarding state during BGP restart. Finally,procedures are outlined for temporarily retaining routing informationacross a TCP transport reset.
